name: Android Location tracking library
tagline: Android library with location tracking feature and many more
body:
### Track location every where and any where 
The library can be used to develop location tracking application, It is fully customized and  has features of GCM(Google cloud messaging) support. This library allow you to develop any type of tracking application for every version of android app .It has features for communication with server asynchronously, sending user registration data,encryption decryption helper class, utility helper class etc. 





### Open Sourced
Library is available for download under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");

### Demand
If any one want some more features to be added in the library or any one want to provide support, contribution or help please do not hesitate just drop me a mail which will take your couple of minutes

### Authors and Contributors
Nagendra K Srivastava 

### Support or Contact
Having any trouble with the use of library read the readme file at https://github.com/nagendraksrivastava/Android-Location-Tracking-Library or drop me a mail at sanu.nagendra@gmail.com or nagendrasrivastava@yahoo.com 
I can't promise but I will try to help you
